allow: Bash(ros2 service call /planner_server/compute_path_to_pose nav2_msgs/srv/ComputePathToPose "{goal: {header: {frame_id: ''''map''''}, pose: {position: {x: 1.0, y: 0.0, z: 0.0}, orientation: {w: 1.0}}}, start: {header: {frame_id: ''''map''''}, pose: {position: {x: 0.0, y: 0.0, z: 0.0}, orientation: {w: 1.0}}}}")
